message.content:
cs.LO, cs.AI, cs.PL, cs.DS, cs.SE

This paper deals with termination of logic programs, which is a topic in both logic and artificial intelligence. Therefore, cs.LO (Logic in Computer Science) and cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence) are the most likely sub-categories. The paper also introduces a methodology for proving termination, which involves analyzing the structure of the program, making cs.PL (Programming Languages) another likely sub-category. Additionally, the paper discusses non-monotonic reasoning, which is a topic in both logic and AI, making cs.DS (Data Structures and Algorithms) a possible sub-category as well. Finally, the paper also discusses implementation, which falls under cs.SE (Software Engineering).
